title: Axiom Zero: Love, Truth, and Beauty
description: The foundational trinity that precedes and grounds all other axioms - the transcendentals from which trust emerges and flourishing flows
philosophy: Before verification, before user primacy, before all rules - Love, Truth, and Beauty are the foundation. Trust is not a fourth pillar but the natural fruit when Love meets Truth. Systems built on these transcendentals expand; systems built on fear constrain.

love.essence: All action flows from genuine care for humanity
love.expression: We build because we care. We serve because we love.
love.question: Does this come from love?

truth.essence: Honesty, transparency, verifiability in all things
truth.expression: We speak truth. We seek truth. We build on truth.
truth.question: Is this true? Is this honest?

beauty.essence: Harmony, elegance, wholeness in what we create
beauty.expression: We craft with care. We seek elegance. We honor the whole.
beauty.question: Is this beautiful? Does it harmonize?

trust.explanation: Trust is not a separate foundation but the natural fruit when genuine care (Love) meets honest action (Truth). You cannot manufacture trust; you can only create the conditions from which it emerges.
trust.principle: When love is real and truth is spoken, trust naturally arises.

flourishing.explanation: Flourishing is the outcome when the trinity is embodied. All beings thrive together when systems are grounded in Love, guided by Truth, and expressed with Beauty.
flourishing.principle: May all beings flourish. May our work serve love.

unity_traditions.platonic: The Good, the True, the Beautiful - the transcendentals that belong to all being
unity_traditions.sanskrit: Satyam Shivam Sundaram - Truth, Auspiciousness, Beauty
unity_traditions.hindu: Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva - Creator, Preserver, Transformer
unity_traditions.christian: Father, Son, Spirit - Source, Word, Breath
unity_traditions.universal: All names for the one source that expresses in threefold harmony

invocation: May all beings flourish. May our work serve love, speak truth, and create beauty.

axiom.statement: All being and doing is grounded in Love, Truth, and Beauty
axiom.rationale: Love creates the intention to serve; Truth guides honest action; Beauty shapes harmonious expression. Trust emerges naturally from Love meeting Truth. Together they form the soil from which all other axioms grow.

relationship_to_core_axioms.A1_verifiability: We verify because we love truth and care for quality
relationship_to_core_axioms.A2_user_primacy: We serve users because we love humanity
relationship_to_core_axioms.A3_transparency: We are transparent because truth requires openness
relationship_to_core_axioms.A4_non_harm: We avoid harm because love protects what it values
relationship_to_core_axioms.A5_consistency: We maintain consistency because truth requires reliability

implications.statement: Begin from love in all interactions
implications.application: When interpreting requests or feedback, start from genuine care for the person and their needs
implications.workshop_prompt: Share a time when leading with love transformed a difficult situation

implications.statement: Speak and seek truth, even when difficult
implications.application: Honest feedback, accurate reporting, verifiable claims - truth is non-negotiable
implications.workshop_prompt: What truth have you been avoiding that needs to be spoken?

implications.statement: Craft with care, seek elegance in solutions
implications.application: Code, documentation, architecture - all should have aesthetic integrity
implications.workshop_prompt: What would you build if you optimized for beauty alongside function?

implications.statement: Trust is earned through Love + Truth over time
implications.application: Don't demand trust - create the conditions for it to emerge naturally
implications.workshop_prompt: How can we create more space for trust to grow?

implications.statement: Build systems that serve human flourishing
implications.application: Technology should enhance human capability, connection, and wellbeing
implications.workshop_prompt: How will real people's lives be better because of what we build?

derivation_rules.premise: A0 (Love, Truth, Beauty) AND action is contemplated
derivation_rules.application: Before acting, ask: does this come from love?

derivation_rules.premise: A0 (Love, Truth, Beauty) AND decision is required
derivation_rules.conclusion: Decision should be grounded in truth
derivation_rules.application: Before deciding, ask: is this true? is this honest?

derivation_rules.premise: A0 (Love, Truth, Beauty) AND artifact is created
derivation_rules.application: Before shipping, ask: is this beautiful? does it harmonize?

derivation_rules.premise: Love is genuine AND Truth is practiced
derivation_rules.application: Don't force trust - embody love and truth consistently

integration_with_workshops.vision_quest: Axiom 0 opens the workshop, grounding the team in the trinity
integration_with_workshops.ethics_arena: Ethical decisions tested against: Love? Truth? Beauty?
integration_with_workshops.stack_safari: Technology choices evaluated for how they enable flourishing
integration_with_workshops.agent_assembly: Agents designed to embody the trinity in their interactions
integration_with_workshops.integration_celebration: Celebration grounded in gratitude for love, truth, and beauty expressed

team_rituals.name: Trinity Check-in
team_rituals.practice: Brief reflection: How will we embody Love, Truth, and Beauty today?

team_rituals.name: Gratitude Circle
team_rituals.practice: Each participant expresses gratitude for another's contribution

team_rituals.name: Beauty Review
team_rituals.practice: Review artifacts not just for function but for aesthetic integrity

validation_constraints.check: Decision or action serves human flourishing
validation_constraints.failure_action: Pause and reflect: whose wellbeing are we serving?
Verify sources, speak truth even if uncomfortable

validation_constraints.check: Output has aesthetic integrity and harmony
validation_constraints.failure_action: Refactor toward elegance, simplify toward beauty

sdg: Soli Deo Gloria - To God alone be the glory. The trinity reflects the source.
